DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effects of AZD1656 on Sitagliptin pharmacokinetics and vice versa in patients with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus.
DOC.brief_title: Investigate the Effect of AZD1656 on the Pharmacokinetics of Sitagliptin in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Patients with confirmed type 2 diabetes mellitus for at least 2 months and treated with metformin. Body mass index between ≥19 and ≤42 kg/m2. Intake of another investigational drug within the last 30 days prior to enrolment. Clinically significant illness or clinically relevant trauma.
